Cobalt AI Gallery Relationship management | SERVICE GoBetween Relationship Management By CobaltML Team for PicoSquish • March 12, 2023 5,280 Likes PicoSquish PicoSquish PicoSquish Relationships Cobalt Analytics Social Affective Computing EMOTIONAL HEALTH Summary GoBetween is a relationship management service developed by the Cobalt Machine Learning Team at PicoSquish. Built on the Cobalt Machine Learning Platform and GlaDOS Intelligent Services, GoBetween helps you be the best parent, child, or romantic partner you can be. Description Enter the PicoSquish.live user id and relationship type for up to five people in your life, and GoBetween will do the rest. Busy? Need more time to yourself? GoBetween’s chatbot can respond to texts on your behalf. All the routine chit-chat gets handled, while you get pulled into the loop for new or high-priority topics. Do you have someone who’s hard to shop for? Not with GoBetween. GlaDOS Intelligent services sees their browsing, buying, and with-list habits, while Cobalt Machine Learning can recommend what he/she/they/zey may like next. Still in a hurry? GoBetween can make the buy for you, and let you know what it is and when it will arrive. Jill I love this thing. My husband thinks I’m the best wife ever. He thinks I’m so attentive and thoughtful. At first I promised myself I’d only use GoBetween as a shopping aid, but as work piled up I just couldn’t resist turning on the chatbot feature. Though I sometimes wish I did more texting myself, I can’t turn back now – I’d never be measure up to how my husband treats me. He always knows what to say, every holiday’s a treat when I read one of his cards or open one of his gifts. I could I match that without GoBetween? Jack I love this thing.
